name: I Heard the Sound...of a Lady's Teardrops Falling
effect: [Main] If your Leader is [Sanji], look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Sanji] or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest. [Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your [Sanji] cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
